description: This drink is for you if you enjoy cuddling on snowy days or reading a good book while sipping a hot beverage. This warm recipe is similar to&nbsp;Spiced Mexican Hot Chocolate but has a tequila twist. It's perfect for&nbsp;Christmas morning or a small holiday gathering. It's extremely chocolaty and simple to make in a slow cooker.
